name: careerwave-monorepo
description: CareerWave - Job Portal with Frontend and Backend

scripts.install:all: cd frontend && bun install && cd ../backend && bun install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && bun dev" "cd backend && bun dev"
scripts.build: cd frontend && bun run build && cd ../backend && bun run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend && bun install && bun run build
